item.title: Mapping CSS Color Names to RGB and Hex Codes
item.description: I recently found myself needing to enforce color values in a hex code format after discovering a mix of hex codes and CSS color names in my data. The easiest way to do this was to build a static map. My application is built with PHP so I needed to get the full list of CSS color names as listed on the W3’s website into an associative PHP array.
